"How many people are affected by TK2-related mitochondrial DNA depletion syndrome, myopathic form ?",The prevalence of TK2-MDS is unknown. Approximately 45 cases have been described.,GHR,"TK2-related mitochondrial DNA depletion syndrome, myopathic form"
